item.title: 3/27/2012 - The Jiggy Jaguar Show
item.author: jiggyjaguar@jiggyjaguar.com
item.description:
Jackie Warner is the author of the New York Times and USA Today bestseller This Is Why You??re Fat (And How to Get Thin Forever). She has starred in two reality series on Bravo, Thintervention and Work Out. She is the owner of Sky Sport and Spa, a complete wellness center in Beverly Hills. For more information about Jackie, visit her website at www.jackiewarner.com.
NYC Based -Dr Annabelle Charbit holds a PhD in Neuroscience from
University College London. "A Life Lived Ridiculously" is Dr. Charbit's first novel. (a novel about when a girl with obsessive compulsive disorder falls in love with a sociopath)

item.title: 3/20/2012 - The Jiggy Jaguar Show
item.author: jiggyjaguar@jiggyjaguar.com
item.description:
David Selig (pronounced Seal- Leg). Founder of TrueTaxHelp.com. He is an experienced federal tax practitioner, NYC Businessman, & Marine.
Gregory G. Gianforcaro (www.gianforcarolaw.com ) is an attorney who practices civil plaintiff and criminal defense within the State of New Jersey. When attorney Gregory G. Gianforcaro was a kid, some of his friends were sexually abused by a priest in the church he attended. That inspired him to go into law and he wound up suing that priest (as well as the church) and has become a passionate defender of sexually abused children.

item.description: This week on the program, we talk about The new site,TV show, and upcoming TV shoots and SNOWSNOWSNOW plus our day job and why we do not talk as much as we used to on the program with all new listeners and people who listen to try to slip us up. Plus WWE at WSU and who that went. Chris joins us to talk TV...bruce and AB coming on board. Update on the book we are in and when will that get released. ICT Underground vs. Jiggy Jag TV. Red/Jigg cold war feud. Rally for rock and how it failed and how I would have made it a success. Plus Live on the street.

item.title: Clayton South
item.author: jiggyjaguar@jiggyjaguar.com
item.description:
Clayton South, SPN (ISSA), is a recognized expert in the bodybuilding / fitness industry with over 150 bodybuilding, fitness and nutrition publications to his credit.
Mr. South, a former personal trainer, has worked as the Chief Research Officer (CRO) of a major nutrition company, and he currently serves as a marketing and advertising advisor to many of the major companies in the dietary supplement industry.
As a consumer advocate, Clayton South tests and reviews dietary supplements every day. In this role he is the author of THE SUPPLEMENT FILES - an unbiased, truthful "no-nonsense" inside look at dietary supplement products.
item.itunes:author: The Jiggy Jaguar Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Clayton South

As a consumer advocate, Clayton South tests and reviews dietary supplements every day. In this role he is the author of THE SUPPLEMENT FILES - an unbiased, truthful "no-nonsense" inside look at dietary supplement products.

item.description:
This week on the Jiggy Jaguar Show. We make our return from the world of dead-air. We talk Britney Spears being in and out of Rehab and thinking she is Miss 666. XM and Sirius getting together and next step is Bankruptcy, then where does a merger leave Howard Stern and O and A? Van Halen could make $$$$ but someone is screwing with the tour and Rock N Roll Hall of Fame induction, but it's not Roth. We listen to my Voicemails and we call Sparkle about starting our own internet station. A Men free island is planned by all the people in dirty night shirts. LIVE ON THE STREET with Redneck Nation. The DUDE update...."Hitting bitches in the face with pans" is in Get Heard. In Top Takes: LIVE ON KJAG,Sound issues fixed,Freaky Friday is a podcast for Feb. 07,No more Blogtalkradio.com,Blogs..Blogs...Blogs...and where have I been? Moving this summer to a brand new city.

item.title: 2006 Year in Review Program
item.author: jiggyjaguar@jiggyjaguar.com
item.description: The year 2006 sucked for me personally but not for this show. We will play some old clips such as Dutch people calling me on Skype. John McCarthy from the UFC on my program. Victor Tringail and Mike Summers on the phone from Bodybuilding.com We also play in Get Heard, ICP-Homies. In top takes we talk about my wedding,The updates on the website, and Freaky Friday along with the poll results from November's website poll. I call OJ Simpson at and wish him a Happy New Year. Phil Pelt/The Des makes an apperance on the phone via

item.title: EPISODE14 - The Jiggy Jaguar Show
item.author: jiggyjaguar@jiggyjaguar.com
item.description: This week on the BIGG SHOW we will dig into the dirt and bring you people who want to rule the world and we will be joined by Kill Pop and L Judah and finally Bill at Cyber-Pump Magazine. Frank Cotolo soundboard will make some prank calls. I'll tell ya about the Russian Spy that was killed over the weekend. Cosmo Kramer and Frank Cotolo do a radio show this week. From the WKRP Cd catalog we will hear from Jon Bare and The Killer Whales. Sexy Sound of the night and Mumia Abu Jamal will talk Liberals. Plus I would like you to call these phone numbers for me...{620} 708-8545 and {620}245-4007 plus {620} 662-7723. Inside Top Takes we will discuss my column this week on Kramer's new career if he wants it and The Wild Bunch Radio show from last Friday with Cousin Chris. and counting down to my marriage date this week.

item.title: Guests: Virgil Aponte/Jamie Hale/Promoter of Midwest Cage Championship
item.author: jiggyjaguar@jiggyjaguar.com
item.description: This week on the broadcast we have interviews with Virgil Aponte who is a stair exercise expert. Joining this week on the broadcast is Jamie Hale from Maxcondition.com Finally we have John from Midwest Cage Championship to talk about their promotion. We also play some pot smoking music from Coconut Monkey Rocket. Mumia joins us for his weekly commentary. LIVE ON THE STREET this week is with Curtis and Jeaves Wilholms. I discuss in the TOP TAKES, Our Wildbunch Special coming up this month. Voting from Tuesday,Faith Hill at the Music awards.
